greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Denominator of the sum of all matrix elements of n X n Hilbert matrix M(i,j)=1/(i+j-1) (i,j = 1..n).
comment: Sum[Sum[1/(i+j-1), {i, 1, n}], {j, 1, n}]] = A117731(n) / A117664(n) = 2n * H'(2n) = 2n * A058313(2n) / A058312(2n), where H'(2n) is 2n-th alternating sign Harmonic Number. H'(2n) = H(2n) - H(n), where H(n) is n-th Harmonic Number. - _Alexander Adamchuk_, Apr 23 2006
link: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Hilbert Matrix.
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Harmonic Number
formula: a(n) = Denominator[Sum[Sum[1/(i+j-1), {i, 1, n}], {j, 1, n}]]. Numerator is A117731(n). - _Alexander Adamchuk_, Apr 23 2006
